summary: Introduction to Python Programming Lab is a comprehensive course designed to build strong foundational knowledge in this important area. This subject covers 13 key modules that progressively develop your understanding. You'll gain both theoretical insights and practical skills through lectures and assignments. The course prepares you for advanced studies and professional applications. Mastering this subject will significantly contribute to your academic and career success.
recommended_books: Python Programming: Using Problem Solving Approach – Reema Thareja
Introduction to Python Programming – Gowrishankar & Veena
Python Data Science Handbook – Jake VanderPlas
course_outcomes: Apply Python syntax and control flow to solve problems.
Use strings and functions in Python programs.
Work with lists, tuples, dictionaries and sets.
Perform file operations, modules and package management.
prerequisites: Basic knowledge of computer programming language
